All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AddDocuments
    This class models the Dialog-Frame regarding the possibility to add further publications to an existing database.
    AuthorDBCreator
    This class contains the method which extracts the header data from the publications and creates or extends a neo4j database.
    AuthorJTable
    This class is the Table in the view to display the results of the author-search to the user.
    AuthorModel
    This class is the model for the AuthorJTable.
    AuthorSearch
    This class carries through the author search.
    AuthorSearchDialog
    This class models the Dialog-Frame regarding the interaction with the user for the author-search.
    CoAuthor
    An instance of this class represents a co-author.
    CoCitationDBCreator
    This class is responsible for extracting the reference-strings from the PDFs and extracting the metadata from the reference-strings.
    Controller
    this class organizes the event-handling concerning all JMenuItems that the JMenuBar in the class #MainFrame contains as well as the Frames and Dialogs that can be opened with these JMenuItems.
    CurrentLoad
    An instance of this class saves the data regarding the loaded database respectively the database that the user has selected.
    DeleteDB
    This class models the Dialog-Frame regarding the interaction with the user for the possibility to delete databases.
    Header
    An instance of this class represents the header (authors and title) of a Publication.
    Labels
    The labels for the nodes.
    LoadDB
    This class models the Dialog-Frame regarding the interaction with the user for the possibility to load databases.
    Main
    This class is the starting-class with the main()-method.
    MainFrame
    This class models the main window for the application.
    NewDB
    This class models the Dialog-Frame regarding the possibility to carry out a new analysis and create a new database.
    PropertiesCache
    This class manages all actions regarding the Properties.
    PropertiesCache.PropertiesHolder  
    Publication
    An instance of this class represents a publication with the corresponding data.
    ReferenceExtractionThread
    In instance of this class is responsible for the reference-string-extraction of a publication.
    References
    An instance of this class represents all references of a publication.
    RelationshipTypes
    Includes the relationship labels
    RelevanceJTable
    This class is the Table in the view to display the results of the relevance-search to the user.
    RelevanceModel
    This class is the model for the RelevanceJTable.
    RelevanceSearch
    This class is responsible for the relevance search.
    SettingDialog  
    SimilarityJTable
    This class is the Table in the view to display the results of the similarity-search to the user.
    SimilarityModel
    This class is the model for the SimilarityJTable.
    SimilaritySearch
    This class is responsible for the similarity search.
    SimilaritySearchDialog
    This class models the Dialog-Frame regarding the interaction with the user for the similarity-search.
    SortCoAuthor
    This class implements the Comparator<> interface and is responsible for sorting CoAuthor objects according to the attribute name correctly.
    SortRelevance
    This class implements the Comparator<> interface and is responsible for sorting Publication objects according to the attribute cocitations correctly.
    TestAuthorGraph  
    TestCoCitGraph
